extendedInfo.description: Use your Android as an offroad topo mapping GPS with the bestselling outdoor navigation app for Android! Try this DEMO for 21 days to see if it is right for you.Use offline topo maps and GPS on hike trails without cell service! The GPS in your Android phone can get its position from satellites, and you donât have to rely on your data plan to get maps. Have more fun and safe GPS adventures in the backcountry.Preload FREE offline topo maps, aerial photos, and road maps on your storage, so they are ready when you need them. Add custom GPS waypoints in longitude and latitude, UTM or MGRS grid reference. Import GPS waypoints from GPX files. Choose icons for waypoints much like in MapSource. (This app uses the WGS84 datum, NAD27 is available in settings).  Use GPS for hunting a waypoint or geocache, for recording tracks and GPS waypoints on your trip, all the while tracking your quest on topographic maps.About topo (topographic) maps: Topo maps show terrain through color and contours, and are useful for navigation offroad. Topo maps and GPS can be used for hiking, hunting, kayaking, snowshoeing, & backpacker trails. The app has many built in map sources and allows you to create your own maps with Mobile Atlas Creator. Built in sources include:OpenStreetMaps and NASA landsat data worldwide. OpenCyle Maps are topo maps that show terrain worldwide. USGS Color Aerial photography.    Topographic Maps of Spain and Italy. Outdoor maps of Germany and AustriaTopo maps of New Zealand Here are some of the outdoor GPS activities BackCountry Navigator has been used for:Hiking both on hiking trails and off trail.  Camping, to find the perfect camping site or the way back to camp. Hunting trips for hunting wild game in rugged areas, including recon for the hunt.Bait fishing or fly fishing with a buddy.   Search and Rescue (SAR) with GPS. Kayak and canoe trips on inland lakes and streams or marine, coastal waters.  Backpacker trips: using topo maps of wilderness areas and national forests to navigate on trails with the GPS.    Snow adventures including snowmobiling, skiing (alpine or cross country) and snowshoeing.This a great addition to the outdoor gear you bought at Cabelas, REI, or another outdoor store. Your android phone could substitute for a Garmin or Magellan outdoor handheld GPS! Find your own ways to have fun in the outdoors. Be a maverick by venturing into new territory beyond cell service boundaries. Become a pro at navigation with GPS. BackCountry Navigator has been previously available on WM devices and preloaded on the Trimble Nomad outdoor rugged device. This Android version is more flexible, featured, and fun.

reviews.title: Decent GPS navigator
reviews.comment: Says 21 day trial, but once I downloaded, it says I have 5 days left. Also needs Google maps as an option, most all the maps have poor resolution in comparison. Still looking for the cool topo  option that visible on its logo.  Waypoints are easy to create and modify. Still waiting to try out the tracking option.
reviews.author: Jamey Rudolph

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I am an avid hunter and this is the best program I have ever used better than my Garmin GPS handheld
reviews.author: Darryl Montgomery

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Used this today at a military installation in tx ti find my bow blind spot using utm coordinates. Worked like a champ. Found my spot, marked it, recorded my path back out.
reviews.author: Troy Jones

reviews.title: Kooooo
reviews.comment: Should be good for hiking and keeping track of where I get lost
reviews.author: Matthew De Sousa

reviews.title: Does what it says..
reviews.comment: A nice enhancement would be pre-configuring other sources of offline maps.  Also, it would be a good idea to add some of stat fields (speed, position, etc) to the compass screen. Would definitely buy...
reviews.author: Osama Al Saadoun

reviews.title: App does exactly what I needed.
reviews.comment: I wanted an app to track where I went, and where my current location is, that also had a variety of maps, then show statistics about my trip - this app does this very nicely. Some option changes, and overall app navigation could be a bit more intuitive. I struggled to find a few features and/or change some options.
reviews.author: Shawn Colbert

reviews.title: BackCountry Battery Killer!!!!
reviews.comment: So, here is what I did. With \"Keep GPS ON\" enabled the app was consuming a lot more battery than Google maps. So I said to myself to try it with \"Keep GPS ON\" disabled. It did seem to consume less battery. Then I came at home, turned off the GPS, charged the phone fully, then watched a movie during which I did not used the phone at all (so the phone was in standby for 2 hours). After the movie, I checked the phone (Nexus 4) and the battery was at 50%!! Looking at battery stats for the 2 hours of standby, BackCountry Nav was accounting for 68% of battery consumption and the rest was the android system, probably because of BackCountry Nav calls to system services. Just for info, my phone is very efficient in standby without this app (it only discharges a few percents over a whole night). Needless to say that if this app kills the battery, then it does not matter AT ALL ANYMORE what features it has!
reviews.author: Valentin Brasov

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I\'m a tough sell but after trialling this I bought it
reviews.author: Martin Hadley

reviews.title: Better than Standalone
reviews.comment: Wow! You really nailed it with this one! I have used many gps units for anything from hunting, fishing, snowmobiling, geocaching, etc. This app has made me want to sell mu other units.I love how you can change the map type from topo to arieal or even both! Can\'t wait untill I really know how to use this programme! Awesome Awesome Awesome Nathan!!!!
reviews.author: Dan Dingfelder

reviews.title: Does what I need. Worth the fee.
reviews.comment: I can enter, edit, and export my waypoints. Good user interface. I couldn\'t find some familiar trails on the maps, but that appears to be a matter with the map providers.
reviews.author: Dirk K

reviews.title: Asus TF700 works well!
reviews.comment: Saw some reviews otherwise and thought I would add my experience....   It has many great features we were looking for.  Although the zoomed in high resolutions are not as good as we need the dev is working with us to make it even better.  I recommend.
reviews.author: Jim Garner

reviews.title: Hard to use
reviews.comment: Uninstalling. Note 2 No map. Black screen for satellite view
reviews.author: Long Denis

reviews.title: Best ever
reviews.comment: For wheel enthusiasts, hikers, bikers, geo cachers. Best app ever
reviews.author: John Anderson

reviews.title: Great on the trail
reviews.comment: I have used yhis app twice now while hiking. With GPS only service, I was able to see and navigate without any ptoblem. Very accurate. Set waypoints on Appalachian Trail and was able to locate off trail water source. Very nice app!!
reviews.author: John Newton

reviews.title: Black screen
reviews.comment: No maps came up - all I got was a black screen with some plus/minus signs and the number 15 when I touched my location/center. I have an Android Asus Transformer and want to be able to track and mark locations when I am on my ATV. I deleted the trial program and will not buy the upgrade.
reviews.author: Lynnell Fulkerson

reviews.title: Black screen
reviews.comment: I spent more than three hours trying to get the right map source.. Most of the time all i got was a black screen. When i did download an area and went away from the wi fi it went back to black screen.. The only thing that worked ALL the time was the add for more money .If the trial is the same as the pro not good.
reviews.author: Walt Weidman

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: As a professional adventurous training instructor I found the peace of mind of knowing that if my skills let me down I had this app to help me out. Very impressed.
reviews.author: Matthew Green

reviews.title: Great gps... if you\'re in the US
reviews.comment: I bought this app because I am backpacking Nepal and wanted some kind of gps. There are no maps available in very popular areas. I am disappointed by this and wish I knew only the US was available before making my puchase, but will use it on the PCT.
reviews.author: Whitnee Goode

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This is a great app! Good work devs, I will be getting the pro version.
reviews.author: Ryan Prather

reviews.title: Rss their way
reviews.comment: They\'ve invented a new way to display rss feeds that\'s far from intuitive.  I just want simple.
reviews.author: Greg Miller
